title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: AAVE Gains 6.9% as Index Trades Higher From Tuesday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) joined Aave (AAVE) as a top performer, rising 3.7%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3310.92, up 0.2% (+5.24) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Fourteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: AAVE (+6.9%) and LTC (+3.7%).

Laggards: XRP (-1.2%) and SUI (-1.2%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading higher with 14 of 20 assets up, led by significant gains in AAVE (+6.9%) and LTC (+3.7%).
